overview: Travis Karian, producer of "From This Day Forward" releases his new film, "The Cast". Fantastic cinematography, both land and water based, compliments a film that focuses on an eclectic group of today`s hottest longboarders hanging in their respective domains. California, Hawaii, Australia and other international destinations and their top talent are all well-represented and edited to a soundtrack that covers Rock and Roll, Jazz and Psychadelic. "The Cast" is a fresher look at longboarding. Do yourself a favor and check it out.
title: The Cast
